live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates. A further update will be provided at 12:01 CT.
58024.summary: Some customers in the Alpine Place and St. George area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
58024.title: Feb 18 - Winnipeg (Alpine Place and St. George) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
